dc:title: On Pilgrimage - October 1956
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes minor trials with the housing department. Admires the work of religious communities and other groups on a trip that included days of recollection, time with her grandchildren, speaking engagements, and conferences.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 711 1956-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
